languages.text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Голос Абеляра, пусть и вкрадчив, все же пронизан нетерпением. Сенешаль бросает подозрительный взгляд на дознавателя.{/n} "Заклинаю вас, давайте не задерживаться здесь дольше самого необходимого".

"Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Голос Абеляра, пусть и вкрадчив, все же пронизан нетерпением. Сенешаль бросает подозрительный взгляд на дознавателя.{/n} "Заклинаю вас, давайте не задерживаться здесь дольше самого необходимого".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}La voz de Abelard, aunque respetuosa, está cargada de impaciencia. El Senescal mira con suspicacia a Heinrix.{/n} «Se lo ruego, no permanezcamos aquí más tiempo del estrictamente necesario».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}La voz de Abelard, aunque respetuosa, está cargada de impaciencia. El Senescal mira con suspicacia a Heinrix.{/n} «Se lo ruego, no permanezcamos aquí más tiempo del estrictamente necesario».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}アベラルドの声は、滑らかな敬語でありながらも焦りを帯びている。家令長は怪しげな目線をハインリックスに投げかけた。{/n}「必要以上に長居すべきではありません。行きましょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}アベラルドの声は、滑らかな敬語でありながらも焦りを帯びている。家令長は怪しげな目線をハインリックスに投げかけた。{/n}「必要以上に長居すべきではありません。行きましょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人……”{n}阿贝拉德彬彬有礼的声音中透露出一丝不耐烦，他狐疑地瞥了海因里希一眼。{/n}“除非真的有必要，否则请您不要在这里逗留太长时间。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……”{n}阿贝拉德彬彬有礼的声音中透露出一丝不耐烦，他狐疑地瞥了海因里希一眼。{/n}“除非真的有必要，否则请您不要在这里逗留太长时间。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}La voix d'Abélard, bien que déférente, n'en est pas moins teintée d'impatience. Le sénéchal lance un regard suspicieux à Heinrix.{/n} « Je vous implore de ne pas vous attarder ici plus longtemps que nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}La voix d'Abélard, bien que déférente, n'en est pas moins teintée d'impatience. Le sénéchal lance un regard suspicieux à Heinrix.{/n} « Je vous implore de ne pas vous attarder ici plus longtemps que nécessaire. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Abelards Stimme ist zwar unterwürfig, aber doch durchzogen von Ungeduld. Der Truchsess wirft Heinrix einen misstrauischen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich flehe Euch an, verweilen wir hier nicht länger als unbedingt nötig."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Abelards Stimme ist zwar unterwürfig, aber doch durchzogen von Ungeduld. Der Truchsess wirft Heinrix einen misstrauischen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich flehe Euch an, verweilen wir hier nicht länger als unbedingt nötig."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Abelard'ın sesi, her ne kadar açıkça hürmetkârlık dolu olsa da sabırsız bir tınıya sahip. Seneşal, Heinrix'e kuşku dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İstirham ediyorum, burada gerekli olduğundan daha uzun süre kalmayalım."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Abelard's voice, though smoothly deferential, is nevertheless tinged with impatience. The Seneschal casts a suspicious glance at Heinrix.{/n} "I implore you, let us not linger here any longer than is strictly necessary."
